stadium.name: The Cliffside Pitch
stadium.description: A perilous, windswept field built next to the town's lighthouse. There is no ocean-side barrier, and the wind is notoriously unpredictable. The tusk-like lighthouse is the only landmark.

stats.pregame_ritual: Telling each other exaggerated lies about their own strength.
Stretching their hamstrings for exactly seven minutes.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Arranging their gear in a perfect, aesthetically pleasing spiral.
Adjusting their codpiece with theatrical importance.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
Muttering a nonsensical rhyme to ward off bad spirits.
Filing down a single fingernail into a sharp point.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Wearing a necklace of polished river stones.
Stretching their hamstrings for exactly seven minutes.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.

Wearing a necklace of polished river stones.

stadium.name: The Oakmaul Grounds
stadium.description: Built over the site of the final battle during the liberation of Hafting now rises The Oakmaul Grounds‚Äîpart arena, part monument. The central oak still bears the burn scars of the final battle. Troll ball here feels more like ritual than sport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Wiggling their fingers in a complex, magical-looking pattern.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Organizing a small betting pool on who will score first.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Anointing their forehead with morning dew.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.

preGame:
Good evening, violent sports enthusiasts! üéôÔ∏è It‚Äôs Tuesday Night Trollball, and I, Nok the Corrupter, am coming to you LIVE from the precipice of disaster‚Äî**The Cliffside Pitch** in Southport! üåä The wind is howling like a banshee with a stubbed toe, and the sea spray is salty enough to cure meat right in the stands! We've got a match tonight that promises to be as perilous as a dinner date with a mimic!

Visiting us today are **The Greenwatch**! üõ°Ô∏è They serve under the banner of The Wardens. You know, Sir Randy and his *precious* fancy bow? üèπ I hear Falric couldn't afford to travel with the team because he spent all the guild's gold on... well, knowing him, probably something shiny for Levania. üíé I watched **Goldenberg Rimola** down on the field earlier, actively trying to communicate with the local seagulls. üê¶ I sure hope those birds speak 'defense,' because looking at the Narwhals' lineup, The Greenwatch is going to need a divine intervention!

And facing them, the home team, **The Southport Narwhals**! üêã Bred in the cold, hard lands of the Grimfrost! King Nezmear might be busy breeding werewolves up north, but his team is breeding *pain* right here on the coast! **Blood Eppes** was down there stretching for exactly seven minutes‚Äîpsychopath behavior, I love it! ‚è±Ô∏è And with the 'Gale-Force Winds' in effect, any ball thrown in the air is merely a suggestion! Grab your grog and hide your children, folks, it‚Äôs time for TROLLBALL! üëπ
postGame:
BY THE ABYSS! What a carnage! What a spectacle! ü©∏ If you tuned in for strategy, you came to the wrong frequency because this was pure, unadulterated BATTERY! The **Southport Narwhals** have skewered The Greenwatch, taking the win **3 to 2 in Overtime**! üèÜ

From the opening whistle, the Narwhals chose violence! **Fineman Dolhenty** didn't just play; she declared war, smashing Herriott Dhiren into the rocky turf early on‚Äîcrack!‚Äîbefore tossing a beauty to **Cibis Areta** for the opening dunk! üèÄ SPLASH! But the real story here wasn't the scoring‚Äîit was the sound of Greenwatch bones snapping like dry twigs! ü¶¥

I haven't seen a team get dismantled like this since Sir Tanos tried to read a book without stabbing it! The Greenwatch spent half the game unconscious! **Malcolm Goer** nearly took Verne Methuselah's head off, and **Crescint Sonia** flattened Nobe Haukom into a fine paste! ü•© The Greenwatch healer, Nariko Javed, was working harder than a necromancer in a plague year trying to patch her team back together! ‚õ∫

It was a revolving door of pain! **Madea Mensch** got knocked out, woke up, and got knocked out again by **Loralyn Lyndy**! **Cibis Areta** sent Rese Halpern into the dirt! It was beautiful! It was art! üé® The Greenwatch were less of a team and more of a collection of target dummies today!

Despite being turned into hamburger meat, The Greenwatch somehow‚Äî*miraculously*‚Äîdragged this bloodbath into Overtime! I assume the wind blew a few points their way, because they certainly didn't look conscious enough to score! But lucky breaks don't win games, brutality does! üí™

In the extra period, **Braden Gaile** proved why he's a monster! Not content with having already hospitalized Goldenberg Rimola and Drona Jacklin earlier in the match, Braden grabbed that leather head, bulldozed through the ruins of the defense, and **SLAMMED IT HOME FOR THE WIN!** üî•

Falric, listen to me: maybe sell some of Levania's trinkets and buy your team some plate mail! Or just stay in the woods with Sir Randy! The Narwhals reign supreme on the cliffs! The surf is red, the ale is cold, and I am ecstatic! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! üòà
